reviews.review: 挺不错的游戏

Uma das melhores sequências que já vi! grande melhoria no story-telling, gráficos e jogablidade!
Adicionou muito mais na lore dos games da Valve e muitos bons elementos novos nos puzzles.
Jogo incrivel! recomendo jogá-lo imediatamente após terminar a campanha do primeiro!
yes

Portal 2 is a phenomenal game, which builds on everything great about the original; a great story, great puzzles, great characters, great music, great community made test chambers and great free mods.

It has an engaging story which fleshes out the backstory of both GLaDOS and Aperture Science with clever voice recordings. The story introduces two new characters Wheatly, a personality core voiced by Stephen Merchant and Cave Johnson, the founder of Aperture Science who is voiced by J.K. Simmons. Both voice actors do a great job bringing these characters to life with lots of portal charm and some funny quotes.

Portal 2 definitely has the best puzzles I've ever played. Some puzzle games feel unfair and I end up getting frustrated, this never happened in portal 2. With every test chamber feeling fair and do-able. It has a good sense of progression with no puzzle elements getting boring or feeling overused. 

And finally it has an amazing community, who have made some very high quality test chambers to enjoy after beating the story nevermind all the great mods like portal stories:Mel

I highly recommend this game at any price, especially on sale at like 1,60€ a no brainer.
O jogo é muito divertido e tem uma historia muito boa e marcante sem contar com o multijogador muito bom e que rende altas risadas

For a game that came out 9 years ago I can say without a doubt that it has aged so well. I recently replayed this game on stream and I can't get over how great it is. The physics alone make this game worth the play. Everything from the commentary to the puzzles are just absolutely incredible. Definitely leaves you wanting more.

非常适合打发时间，并且，一定要先玩单人模式再玩双人！顺便，第一章的NPC是个话痨，双人模式的语音非常阴阳怪气，一失误就good job，感觉我的智商受到了嘲讽，生气气。
学习之余打通了单人模式，怎么说呢，二代比一代的防晕眩做的好，一代我真的玩半个小时就想吐。567章换了一种风格，不再是测试，大逃杀的压迫感加重，我真的是，心脏都要跳出来。BOSS战真的是有beginner‘ s luck，大佬的操作就是行云流水和boss打的风生水起，而我只能默默的提前打洞希望不会因超时而被毒死。（不过也确实打了个措手不及，顺利通关）结尾G姐送主人公坐电梯上去被小炮塔激光扫射，那一刻我连遗言都想好了。
总之，这个游戏非常值得购买，双人模式也很有趣，甚至还有坑队友的成就，打折时一二代一共9元，还等什么？冲了兄弟们！

Excellent game.

Portal 2 is an immensely polished single-player puzzle game with a delightful cast of characters and a storyline overflowing with charm. The puzzles have been cleverly designed so that solving them is satisfying and challenging. In addition to the 10-hour single-player campaign, there's a trove of community-made maps and a co-op campaign. Although the co-op mode is not as polished as the single-player, it still provides a fun puzzle experience with others and the vast amount of community-made workshop content more than makes up for it. Overall, it's a classic Valve game deserving of its beloved and elevated status.

Portal 2 may not have the same fantastic atmosphere as P1, but in my opinion, it's a better game. It's not just the tests, those are improved though.
What it lacks in atmoshpere it makes up for in story and characters. and yeah the end credits in this one are perfect again. If you somehow haven't yet. PLAY IT

Simplemente maravilloso, el juego ofrece una experiencia excitante, misteriosa y cómica.
La historia es lo más destacable de este título, recomiendo leer los cómics, así como jugar Portal para tener una mejor noción del ambiente.

Portal 2 te sumerge una atmósfera oscura, enigmática e inmersiva, aunque tiene sus momentos con cierta comedia ridícula en donde los personajes no se toman en serio a sí mismos, lo que me parece, un humor bastante bueno y carismático.

Me siento muy seguro al decir que es uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado, además de tener un Multijugador bastante divertido. También tengo que destacar salas de la comunidad, así como su mods.

Es un juego bastante completo y se lo recomiendo a cualquier persona.
